import React, { Component } from "react"; import "./Progress.css"; import Header from "../../components/Header/Header"; import Footer from "../../components/Footer/Footer"; import { setCookie, getCookie } from "../../services/Cookie"; import data from './Challenges.json'; class Progress extends React.Component { getChallenges() { const challenges = data.map((item) =>{ return(

{item.type}

{item.challenge}

) }) return (challenges) } render() { return( <>
{this.getChallenges()}

See your Progress here

Drink enough water
On Progress
Workout for 10 minutes everyday
Finished
Make new friends
) } } export default Progress;
